text1: This diagram shows the categories inside your Facebook data that we currently analyze and ranks them by how many data entries we found.
legend: Representation of the number of entries per category
text2: This diagram is called a bubble chart. Each bubble represents one datatype. The number of bubbles shows how many data types there are. The size of each bubble is dependent on the amount of data inside.
text3: Please note, that we are only using parts of your Facebook data for this analysis so far. So the numbers on this screen show a tendency, but not the total number in your download.
